meanings.sent1: She is densifying the mixture by adding more flour.
meanings.sent2: The snow is densifying as the temperature drops.
meanings.sent3: The chef was densifying the soup so much that it turned into a thick stew!
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was densifying with new skyscrapers rising every month.
meanings.sent5: The artist was densifying the colors on the canvas, creating a vibrant masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The process of increasing the density of something.
meanings.sent1: The densifying of the population in the urban area led to more traffic.
meanings.sent2: The densifying of the solution resulted in a higher concentration of particles.
meanings.sent3: The densifying of the cake batter made it rise beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The densifying of the forest canopy created a dark and mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The densifying of the crowd at the concert made it feel like a sea of people.
